title: I'm a research scholar, this is a survey related to my research on a sociopolitical issue related to India. If you could please find some time to fill it out. Thanks in advance.
selftext:
Hey there, hope this is not an intrusion. Would you be willing to spare just 10 minutes of your time to take part in this survey that is essential for my research? Your unique perspective is incredibly valuable, and I‚Äôd genuinely appreciate your contribution. Sincere Thanks.

Link to the survey: [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc15pU9ByztBAbCTRcZNH6jvQTmq3IC-3z3oTPPGcjf15XyTw/viewform](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc15pU9ByztBAbCTRcZNH6jvQTmq3IC-3z3oTPPGcjf15XyTw/viewform)
comments:
a) it asks for sign in. 

b) Introduce it to us, OP! What it's about etc.

Hey, yes sorry, sign-in is essential to verify the responses are genuine and by actual people for the credibility of the data collected. 

In terms of the survey, it is an attempt to understand the impact of social media in shaping opinions and perceptions regarding the government's decision to ban Hijabs in educational institutes and organizations. I aim to analyze the level of understanding among social media users and identify the key challenges faced during the discourse. Also, understand the nuances that were highlighted/neglected from the users' perspective.

Hey I completed your survey, but please keep in mind that I got bored by the time I reached around midway of your survey and then I randomly clicked a bunch of answers to complete it.

Would suggest to shorten your survey by at least 10 questions, if you want to get a true sentiment  on the issue. 

Cheers!!
Hey, thanks a lot. Will definitely keep in mind. Lemme see if I can shorten it now. üôèüèª

Hello! 

Your survey was really interesting! 

I would really appreciate it if you could help me by filling out my survey form. It will not take more than 10 minutes. 

Link: [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScors7zDVqSYPZ8UivjnBUxLQfIXSg2shEDu4XgYbNdeyR2kw/viewform](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScors7zDVqSYPZ8UivjnBUxLQfIXSg2shEDu4XgYbNdeyR2kw/viewform)

Thanks in advance!
Shall do by tonight. Yours looks interesting as well. And since I have a kid I might be useful üòÖ
Whoops. I don't fall in the age group you are looking for :(
